ARTIFACT_MACHINE_SPIRIT Machine Spirit $1$2$4 ARTIFACT_MACHINE_SPIRIT_LORE How much of your soul are you willing to sacrifice for knowledge? Spending a few months merged with the Machine Spirit will likely change you into a babbling, toaster-loving freak. But you want it all, and you want it now!
ARTIFACT_BLOODTHIRSTY_SOUL Bloodthirsty soul ARTIFACT_BLOODTHIRSTY_SOUL_DESCRIPTION An artifact.\nEvery time a unit is killed in combat, hero can use his abilities again. ARTIFACT_BLOODTHIRSTY_SOUL_LORE From this moment a voice lurks in your head. It is patiently waiting for its moment and when an enemy finally gives you a heavy blow it starts to sing about vengeance.
ARTIFACT_BLOODSHED_MURMUR Bloodshed murmur ARTIFACT_BLOODSHED_MURMUR_DESCRIPTION An artifact.\nResets special abilities cooldown timer of friendly units when any unit dies in combat. ARTIFACT_BLOODSHED_MURMUR_LORE It isn't your voice, but it speaks through you. Inspiring and kindling, making all your warriors feel the rage for fallen comrades changing them to restless avengers.
ARTIFACT_DISTURBED_INCEPTION Disturbed inception ARTIFACT_DISTURBED_INCEPTION_DESCRIPTION An artifact.\nAdditional counter attack for all friendly units. ARTIFACT_DISTURBED_INCEPTION_LORE It is not only you, your troops feel the change too. Some may fight it, some may dread it but deep down they started to crave every chance to hurt and destroy. It's dirty, but since when is warfare... fair?
